content.json:
## Drivers details (not Microsoft) installed on devices --- This report lists all drivers (not Microsoft) installed on all Intune devices.
Drivers are collected though a remediation script executed and scheduled on all devices every 2 days. Two tabs are available: 1. Resume: count of drivers by elements 2. Details: details of drivers on devices 3. Comparison: compares drivers between two devices 4. Windows Update: drivers installed by Windows update **For a better result, filter by device name, model, manufacturer or class.**
**By filtering on device name, you will get below information for this device:** - All drivers installed - Drivers older than 2 years - Latest drivers installed duing last 2 months - History of drivers - History of Windows Update package **⚠ Note :** Drivers inventory is updated every days

parameters.name: Manufacturers
parameters.label: Filter by manufacturer
parameters.query:
DriversInventory_CL
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
//| summarize DriversInventory_CL = count() by manufacturer_s
| distinct DeviceManufacturer_s

content.query:
IntuneDevices
| where DeviceName contains "{ComputerName:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName
| extend DeviceLastContact = make_datetime(LastContact)
| extend DateFormat = format_datetime(DeviceLastContact,"MM-dd-yyyy hh:mm")
| join DriversInventory_Translate_CL on $right.DeviceName_s == $left.DeviceName
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName
| project ['Device last contact']=DateFormat,['Primary user']=UserName,Model=Model,['Model friendly name']=ModelFriendlyName_s,Manufacturer

IntuneDevices
| where DeviceName contains "{ComputerName:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName
| extend DeviceLastContact = make_datetime(LastContact)
| extend DateFormat = format_datetime(DeviceLastContact,"MM-dd-yyyy hh:mm")
| join DriversInventory_Translate_CL on $right.DeviceName_s == $left.DeviceName
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName
| project ['Device last contact']=DateFormat,['Primary user']=UserName,Model=Model,['Model friendly name']=ModelFriendlyName_s

DriversInventory_CL 
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s
| count

DriversInventory_CL 
| where isnotempty(ModelFriendlyName_s)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ModelFriendlyName_s
| project ModelFriendlyName_s
| count

DriversInventory_CL 
| where isnotempty(DeviceManufacturer_s)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceManufacturer_s
| project DeviceManufacturer_s
| count

DriversInventory_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s//, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s)
| where isnotempty(ModelFriendlyName_s)
| where ModelFriendlyName_s has_any ({Models})
| summarize DriversInventory_CL = count() by ModelFriendlyName_s
| order by DriversInventory_CL
content.title: Devices count per models

content.query:
DriversInventory_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(ModelFriendlyName_s)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s)
| where ModelFriendlyName_s has_any ({Models})
| where DeviceClass_s has_any ({Class})
| summarize DriversInventory_CL = count() by DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| order by DriversInventory_CL
| project ['Driver name']=DriverName_s,['Driver version']=DriverVersion_s,['Devices count']=DriversInventory_CL
content.title: Devices count per drivers version

content.query:
DriversInventory_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s)
| where ModelFriendlyName_s has_any ({Models})
| where DeviceClass_s has_any ({Class})
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or DeviceName_s contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| project ['Last contact']=TimeGenerated, Device=DeviceName_s,['Driver name']=DriverName_s,['Driver version']=DriverVersion_s,['Driver date']=format_datetime(DriverDate_value_t, "dd/MM/yyyy"),Class=DeviceClass_s,DeviceID=DeviceID_s,Constructeur=manufacturer_s
| limit 1000
content.title: Full details (filter on device name for better result)

content.query:
DriversInventory_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(ModelFriendlyName_s)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s)
| where ModelFriendlyName_s has_any ({Models})
| where DeviceClass_s has_any ({Class})
| project Model=ModelFriendlyName_s, ['Driver name']=DriverName_s, ['Driver version']=DriverVersion_s, ['Driver date']=DriverDate_value_t
| limit 5000
content.title: Drivers installed per models

content.query:
DriversInventory_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s)
| where DriverDate_value_t > ago(60d)
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or DeviceName_s contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| where ModelFriendlyName_s has_any ({Models})
| where DeviceClass_s has_any ({Class})
| project ['Device name']=DeviceName_s,['Driver name']=DriverName_s,['Driver version']=DriverVersion_s,['Driver date']=format_datetime(DriverDate_value_t, "dd/MM/yyyy"),Class=DeviceClass_s
content.title: Last drivers installed for a device (last 2 months)

content.query:
DriversInventory_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s)
| where DriverDate_value_t < ago(730d)
| where "{ComputerName:escape}" == "*" or DeviceName_s contains "{ComputerName:escape}" or "{ComputerName:escape}" == "All devices"
| where ModelFriendlyName_s has_any ({Models})
| where DeviceClass_s has_any ({Class})
| project ['Device name']=DeviceName_s,['Driver name']=DriverName_s,['Driver version']=DriverVersion_s,['Driver date']=format_datetime(DriverDate_value_t, "dd/MM/yyyy"),Class=DeviceClass_s
content.title: Drivers > 2 years (filter by device name)

content.query:
DriversInventory_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s//, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s)
| where isnotempty(ModelFriendlyName_s)
| where DriverDate_value_t < ago(730d)
| where DriverName_s !contains "Cisco AnyConnect"
| summarize DriversInventory_CL = count() by ModelFriendlyName_s
| order by DriversInventory_CL
content.title: Devices with drivers > 2 years

content.query:
DriversInventory_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s)
| where isnotempty(ModelFriendlyName_s)
| where DeviceClass_s has_any ({Class})
| where DriverDate_value_t < ago(730d)
| where DriverName_s !contains "Cisco AnyConnect"
| summarize DriversInventory_CL = count() by  DriverName_s
| order by DriversInventory_CL
| project Driver=DriverName_s
content.title: Older drivers (> 2 years)

content.query:
DriversInventory_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceClass_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(ModelFriendlyName_s)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s)
| where DeviceClass_s contains "DISPLAY"// or DeviceClass_s contains "MONITOR"
| where ModelFriendlyName_s has_any ({Models})
| order by ModelFriendlyName_s
| project Model=ModelFriendlyName_s, ['Driver name']=DriverName_s, ['Driver version']=DriverVersion_s, ['Driver date']=DriverDate_value_t,Device=DeviceName_s
content.title: List of graphics drivers per models

content.query:
DriversInventory_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceClass_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(ModelFriendlyName_s)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s)
| where DeviceClass_s contains "NET" or DeviceClass_s contains "NetClient" or DeviceClass_s contains "NetService" or DeviceClass_s contains "Infrared"
| where ModelFriendlyName_s has_any ({Models})
| order by ModelFriendlyName_s
| project Model=ModelFriendlyName_s, ['Driver name']=DriverName_s, ['Driver version']=DriverVersion_s, ['Driver date']=DriverDate_value_t,Device=DeviceName_s, Class=DeviceClass_s
content.title: List of network drivers per models

content.query:
IntuneDevices
| where DeviceName contains "{Device1:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName
| extend IntuneLastContact= make_datetime(LastContact)
| extend LastContactFormated = format_datetime(IntuneLastContact, 'yyyy-M-dd')
| project Device=DeviceName,Model,Manufacturer,User=UserName,LastContact=LastContactFormated
content.title: Infos about first device

content.query:
IntuneDevices
| where DeviceName contains "{Device2:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName
| extend IntuneLastContact= make_datetime(LastContact)
| extend LastContactFormated = format_datetime(IntuneLastContact, 'yyyy-M-dd')
| project Device=DeviceName,Model,Manufacturer,User=UserName,LastContact=LastContactFormated
content.title: Infos about second device

content.query:
let Device1 = DriversInventory_CL
//| where DeviceName_s contains "{Device1:escape}"
| where DeviceName_s contains_cs "LAPTOP-0SCJHEDR"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s);
let Device2 = DriversInventory_CL
| where DeviceName_s contains_cs "LAPTOP-Q3CT1MAO"
//| where DeviceName_s contains "{Device2:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s);
Device2 | join Device1 on $left.DriverName_s == $right.DriverName_s
| where DriverName_s == DriverName_s1
| summarize SameDrivers=countif(DriverVersion_s == DriverVersion_s1), DiffVersions=countif(DriverVersion_s <> DriverVersion_s1) 
| project ['Same drivers & same versions']=SameDrivers, ['Same drivers but different versions']=DiffVersions

let Device1 = DriversInventory_CL
| where DeviceName_s contains "{Device1:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s);
let Device2 = DriversInventory_CL
| where DeviceName_s contains "{Device2:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s);
Device2 | join Device1 on $left.DriverName_s == $right.DriverName_s
| where DriverName_s == DriverName_s1
| where DriverVersion_s <> DriverVersion_s1
| extend DriverDate1=format_datetime(DriverDate_value_t, "dd/MM/yyyy")
| extend DriverDate2=format_datetime(DriverDate_value_t1, "dd/MM/yyyy")
| project Driver=DriverName_s,['Driver version device 1']=DriverVersion_s,['Driver version device 2']=DriverVersion_s1,['Driver date device 1']=DriverDate1,['Driver date device 2']=DriverDate2,Class=DeviceClass_s,DeviceID=DeviceID_s
content.title: Same drivers but different versions

content.query:
let Device1 = DriversInventory_CL
| where DeviceName_s contains "{Device1:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s);
let Device2 = DriversInventory_CL
| where DeviceName_s contains "{Device2:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s);
Device2 | join Device1 on $left.DriverName_s == $right.DriverName_s
| where DriverName_s == DriverName_s1
| where DriverVersion_s == DriverVersion_s1
| extend DriverDate1=format_datetime(DriverDate_value_t, "dd/MM/yyyy")
| extend DriverDate2=format_datetime(DriverDate_value_t1, "dd/MM/yyyy")
| project Driver=DriverName_s,['Driver version device 1']=DriverVersion_s,['Driver version device 2']=DriverVersion_s1,['Driver date device 1']=DriverDate1,['Driver date device 2']=DriverDate2,Class=DeviceClass_s,DeviceID=DeviceID_s
content.title: Same drivers and same versions

content.query:
let Device1 = DriversInventory_CL
| where DeviceName_s contains "{Device1:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s);
let Device2 = DriversInventory_CL
| where DeviceName_s contains "{Device2:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s);
Device2 | join kind=rightanti Device1 on $left.DriverName_s == $right.DriverName_s
| extend DriverDate=format_datetime(DriverDate_value_t, "dd/MM/yyyy")
| project Device=DeviceName_s,Driver=DriverName_s,['Driver version']=DriverVersion_s,['Driver date']=DriverDate,Class=DeviceClass_s,DeviceID=DeviceID_s
content.title: Drivers in Device 1 but not in Device 2

content.query:
let Device1 = DriversInventory_CL
| where DeviceName_s contains "{Device1:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s);
let Device2 = DriversInventory_CL
| where DeviceName_s contains "{Device2:escape}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s, DriverName_s, DriverVersion_s
| where isnotempty(DriverDate_value_t)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName_s)
| where isnotempty(DriverName_s);
Device2 | join kind=leftanti Device1 on $left.DriverName_s == $right.DriverName_s
| extend DriverDate=format_datetime(DriverDate_value_t, "dd/MM/yyyy")
| project Device=DeviceName_s,Driver=DriverName_s,['Driver version']=DriverVersion_s,['Driver date']=DriverDate,Class=DeviceClass_s,DeviceID=DeviceID_s
content.title: Drivers in Device 2 but not in Device 1

content.query:
DriversInventory_Translate_CL
| where isnotempty(WUName_s)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName_s,WUName_s
| summarize ['Devices count'] = count() by Model=ModelFriendlyName_s,['WUName_s']=WUName_s
| order by ['Devices count']
content.title: Devices count by Windows Update package version and model

content.query:
DriversInventory_Translate_CL
| where isnotempty(WUName_s)
//| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by WUName_s,ModelFriendlyName_s
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ModelFriendlyName_s,WUName_s
| extend DriverDate_Format = format_datetime(DriverDate_t, 'yyyy-M-dd')
| summarize arg_max(DriverDate_t,*) by ModelFriendlyName_s
| project Model=ModelFriendlyName_s,['Package name']=WUName_s,['Package date']=DriverDate_Format
content.title: Last Windows Update drivers package by version and model

content.query:
DriversInventory_Translate_CL
| where DeviceName_s contains "{ComputerName:escape}"
| where isnotempty(DeviceManufacturer_s)
| extend DateFormat = format_datetime(DriverDate_t,"MM-dd-yyyy")
| project ['Driver date']=DateFormat,['Windows Updatate package']=WUName_s,Driver=DriverName_s,['Driver manufacturer']=DriverManufacturer_s,['Driver version']=DriverVersion_s,['Driver friendly name']=DriverFriendlyName_s
content.title: Drivers installed by Windows Update (filter on device name)
